alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 31 at 3:45AM HST until December 31 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR THE NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI AND OAHU... .The slow subsiding west northwest swell (320 degrees) will continue to maintain advisory level surf along exposed north and west shores of Niihau, Kauai and Oahu through the afternoon. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Surf 12 to 16 feet along north-facing shores of Niihau and Kauai, 10 to 15 feet along north-facing shores of Oahu. Surf 8 to 12 feet along west-facing shores. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast
